active.description: Whether the product is currently available for purchase.

animation.description: An optional animation for the product.

collection.description: The collection that this product will belong to.

description.description: The product’s description, meant to be displayable to the customer. Use this field to optionally store a long form explanation of the product being sold for your own rendering purposes.

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format.

name.description: The product’s name, meant to be displayable to the customer.

properties.description: Properties that help identify this product

tags.description: A list of up to 8 tags that help organize the product

total_supply.description: A positive integer in cents (or 0 for a free price) representing how much to charge.
